subject: Re: Light anomalillies?
author: wgungfu
full_text:
Heya Frank, finally something I can contribute to here. :)  Taking a
look at it, that looks like multiple reflections of that middle post
you have sticking up.  With all that metal and the (what looks like)
lucite over the echo box, its creating multiple reflections on the lid
of the echo box.


Marty
